name: Captain Lennox (V)
Lore: 'Captain of the Imperial Star Destroyer Tyrant. An able leader. Unlike most Imperial officers, he is dedicated to his ship and crew. Finds political maneuvering distasteful.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of any Star Destroyer he pilots.  Deploys free aboard Tyrant, and, while aboard, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise and your total power here is +1 for each of opponent''s starfighters here.',
